actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To amend section 3 of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to coordinate and synchronize pesticide data requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, whenever data in support of a pesticide registration are requested by State or Federal agencies, to coordinate and synchronize such data requests to avoid unnecessary repetition and redundancy. Requires the Administrator to implement procedures for such coordination and synchronization to provide for identical and concurrent data requirements by all agencies.

titles.title: To amend section 3 of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to coordinate and synchronize pesticide data requirements.
